overview: An online experience-generating system based on the unique mechanisms of dreams, which seem to draw upon personal, collective and genetic memories to generate content. Our experiences, senses, intuitions, and emotions are filtered by a neurological system that then presents us with a simulated reality guided by its own rules and internal logic. In a way, Dream is more of an alternate reality than a virtual reality; it is a brief immersion in a parallel dimension that asks us to reconsider our relationship to both our dreaming and waking states.
title: Dream
